nodes.text: The Narglatch Airtech prefabricated kit was a product of Narglatch AirTech. The kits contained airspeeder components that a buyer could use to build their own custom airspeeder. The XJ-6 airspeeder, owned by Senator Simon Greyshade, and XJ-2 airspeeder, owned by Senator Bail Organa, were both constructed using prefabricated kits manufactured by Narglatch AirTech.
